title: Average U.S. teen Twitter follower count 2015
summary: Overall Share of respondents has increased over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 101_to_200 to 201_to_300, and finally slightly increasing from 201_to_300 to Don't_know.
The line significantly increased by 5.0 from Year 201_to_300 to 301_and_more, and lastly, increased by 34.0 from Year 301_and_more to Don't_know.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 301_and_more and Don't_know.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 44.0 was reached at Year Don't_know
Minimum Share of respondents about 5.0 was reached at Year 201_to_300
min_summary: In general Share of respondents has rose over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 101_to_200 to 201_to_300, and finally slightly increasing from 201_to_300 to Don't_know.

max_summary: In general Share of respondents has rose over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 101_to_200 to 201_to_300, and finally slightly increasing from 201_to_300 to Don't_know.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 301_and_more and Don't_know.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 44.0 was reached at Year Don't_know
Minimum Share of respondents about 5.0 was reached at Year 201_to_300
The line drastically increased by 2.0 times from Year 201_to_300 to 301_and_more, and lastly, increased by 4.4 times from Year 301_and_more to Don't_know.
